alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a piperidine ring, which is a saturated aliphatic six-member ring with one nitrogen atom and five carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Piperidines

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one monocyclic ring system consisting of benzene.
alternative_parents.name: Benzene and substituted derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds in which a hydroxy group, -OH, is attached to a saturated carbon atom R3COH (R not H ).
alternative_parents.name: Tertiary alcohols

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an alkyl chain with an amine group bound to the C1 atom and an alcohol group bound to the C3 atom.
alternative_parents.name: 1,3-aminoalcohols

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a trialkylamine group, characterized by exactly three alkyl groups bonded to the amino nitrogen.
alternative_parents.name: Trialkylamines

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an alcohol group attached to an aromatic carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Aromatic alcohols

class.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
class.name: Organonitrogen compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as aralkylamines. These are alkylamines in which the alkyl group is substituted at one carbon atom by an aromatic hydrocarbyl group.

direct_parent.description: Alkylamines in which the alkyl group is substituted at one carbon atom by an aromatic hydrocarbyl group.
direct_parent.name: Aralkylamines

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds formally derived from ammonia by replacing one, two or three hydrogen atoms by hydrocarbyl groups, and having the general structures RNH2 (primary amines), R2NH (secondary amines), R3N (tertiary amines).
subclass.name: Amines

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
superclass.name: Organic nitrogen compounds
